page.title: 15LEISURE 1
page.content: Our area has many leisure facilities. People enjoy swimming in the two pools.Many people go to Knighton park. We also have tennis,badminton and bowls and many team sports are played. There are also shops,scout and guide packs. The park is 30 years old.It contains a childrens play area,a mini-golf course,tennis courts,a stream,a waterfall,heather gardens,and some woods.It covers about 97 acres,and is used by several hundred people daily. In our area are several sports grounds.Behind Knighton Park are some private playing fields.They are used for cricket in the summer and football and hockey in the winter.Along side is a changing pavillion.The university ground is at the back of the park.It has hockey,football,and cricket pitches and nets to practice in.
